title: China 's share of global gross domestic product ( GDP ) 2012 to 2024
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Share of global GDP. In total the number of data points it has is 13.
Overall Share of global GDP has increased over the Year.
Share of global GDP is slightly increasing from 2012 to 2024.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2012 and 2013.
The highest Share of global GDP, of value 21.39 was reached at Year 2024
Minimum Share of global GDP about 15.26 was reached at Year 2012
